comment.author: 7892156@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Egyptian Royalty, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 49028571@N07
comment._content:
This is the exterior of the hotel 'Mena House', which opened in 1886, in Gizeh, Egypt (suburb of the capital Cairo) at the foot of the Pyramids. At that time it was called 'Mena Hotel'. All this is described in the book 'The Mena House Treasury' by Andreas Augustin.
The picture can be dated with 1890.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hello anau1,
Thanks for the added information. Our archivist checked it and we've updated the caption and title. she also found a date (1891) on the actual slide, so we've included that as well. We left "Gizeh Museum" -- it was on the slide, so we want to document that. 
We appreciate your help!
Deb Wythe,
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
